articles.title: SA faces suicide crisis as Sadag fields more than 75,000 calls for help since January - TimesLIVE
articles.description: The SA Depression and Anxiety Group (Sadag) has since January fielded more than 75,000 calls from South Africans contemplating suicide as well as from those who have attempted ending their lives.
